poemLines: Before the stage knew your name, it already waited for your light.
Even silence moves when you enter a room.
I saw your reflection before I saw your face.

questions.text: What's one sound that always makes you feel safe?
questions.yourAnswer: Your voice when you're excited about something you love

questions.text: When you look in the mirror, what part of yourself are you most proud of?
questions.yourAnswer: The way I keep trying even when things are hard
